subject: Gymnastics
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Bridget Sloan had just turned 16 when she went to China with the U.S. women’s gymnastics team. Now 17, she said she’s “still just a kid.”
snippet: Bridget Sloan had just turned 16 when she went to China with the U.S. women’s gymnastics team. Now 17, she said she’s “still just a kid.”
